# matchEthernet

**Instance Property**

A property that indicates Ethernet support for Local Push Connectivity.

## Declaration

```swift
var matchEthernet: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

If this value is `true` (Swift) or `YES` (Objective-C), the system starts the [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEAppPushProvider] when the following criteria are true:

- The iOS device is connected to an Ethernet network.
- The Ethernet network is the primary route on the device.

Have your [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEAppPushProvider] determine that its functionality is viable on the network. If the network doesn’t support the provider running over Ethernet, your provider needs to call [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEAppPushProvider/unmatchEthernet()] to stop itself.
title: matchEthernet
